attributes.description: Default font weight for body text styles.
For all text that may appear beside iconography, such as in a button.
Use with caution as fallback fonts do not support this font weight and will default to bold weight.
Use sparingly for emphasising text, such as in a lozenge.
For our default product UI heading text.

Typography adg3/font.family.heading.value: ui-sans-serif, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif

attributes.description: For our default product UI body text.

Typography adg3/font.family.body.value: ui-sans-serif, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif

Typography adg3/font.family.code.value: ui-monospace, Menlo, "Segoe UI Mono", "Ubuntu Mono", monospace

attributes.description: For our brand heading text. Uses Charlie Display.

Typography adg3/font.family.brand.headin.value: "Charlie Display", ui-sans-serif, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif

attributes.description: For our brand body text. Uses Charlie Text.

Typography adg3/font.family.brand.body.value: "Charlie Text", ui-sans-serif, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif
